channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform

item.title: CVE-2017-1148|2024-08-05T13:25:17.379Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.2 and 7.3 with OpenPages Loss Event Entry (LEE) application could allow a user to obtain sensitive information including private APIs that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 122201.

item.title: CVE-2017-1300|2024-08-05T13:32:29.662Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 125162.

item.title: CVE-2017-1147|2024-08-05T13:25:17.340Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 122200.

item.title: CVE-2017-1290|2024-08-05T13:32:28.474Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125151.

item.title: CVE-2017-1333|2024-08-05T13:32:29.417Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 could allow an unauthenticated user to obtain sensitive information about the server that could be used in future attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 126241.

item.title: CVE-2017-1679|2024-08-05T13:39:32.218Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 8.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information from error log files. IBM X-Force ID: 134001.
